biolockj.util.r

Class R_ConfigScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.r.R_ConfigScript

  • public class R_ConfigScript
extends Object
    This class builds the Config R script used by all standard R Script modules. Each script will call the ConfigScript via R's source command to make the Config variables available.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ALL_ATTS
      R variable that holds a complete list of report fields: "allAtts"
      protected static String R_BASE_COLOR
      Config property: "r.colorBase" defines the base plot label color
      protected static String R_COLOR_PALETTE
      Config property: "r.colorPalette" defines the color palette to use in plots
      static String R_DEBUG
      Config Boolean property: "r.debug"
      If enabled, an R script debug log file is created for each taxonomy level.
      protected static String R_HIGHLIGHT_COLOR
      Config property: "r.colorHighlight" defines the highlight color for significant labels
      protected static String R_PCH
      Config property: "r.pch" defines the plot point base size and shape
      static String R_PLOT_WIDTH
      Config Integer property: "r.plotWidth" defines the max number of characters on xy-axis
      protected static String R_POINT_COLOR
      Config property: "r.colorPoint" defines the plot point color
      static String R_PVAL_CUTOFF
      Config Double property: "r.pvalCutoff" defines the P-value cutoff for significance
      protected static String R_PVAL_FORMAT
      Config property: "r.pValFormat" defines the P-value display format used by R sprintf(...) function
      static String R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD
      Config Numeric property: "r.rareOtuThreshold"
      If value is between 0-1, it is considered a minimum percentage.
      static String R_SAVE_R_DATA
      Config Boolean property: "r.saveRData" can be enable to call save.image to save the R session used to run the R script.

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected R_ConfigScript(R_Module rModule)
      This method generates the base script R code required by all standard R modules.

      • R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD

        public static final String R_RARE_OTU_THRESHOLD
        Config Numeric property: "r.rareOtuThreshold"
        If value is between 0-1, it is considered a minimum percentage. If value is greater than 1, it is a hard numerical minimum. OTUs not found in the number or percentage of samples configured will be ommitted from the report.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • R_SAVE_R_DATA

        public static final String R_SAVE_R_DATA
        Config Boolean property: "r.saveRData" can be enable to call save.image to save the R session used to run the R script.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getPch

        protected static String getPch()
                        throws Exception
        Set Config."r.pch" value in R script.
        If value is non-numeric, wrap the value in double quotes.
        Returns:
        PCH value as String
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config."r.pch" is invalid
